output:
You look good out there doing your thing Don't you know I know where you've been
I've been working every night Just keep trying, put it right
Don't you see what you're doing to me Oh, such love is in my blood
Just like a drug, no way out
Lying there again in your arms Still tempting me with all of your charms
Never get you out of my brain My love for you drives me insane
There's no way out
There's no way out
There's no way out
There's no way out
There's no way out
There's no way out
There's no way out
